details.description: Use Contracts Finder to find out about current contract opportunities with the government and its agencies
details.introduction:
Contracts Finder lets you search for information about contracts worth over Â£10,000 with the government and its agencies.

You can use Contracts Finder to:

  • search for current contract opportunities
  • find out what’s coming up in the future
  • look up details of previous tenders and contracts
